article_title: Russia to Maintain Tight Monetary Policy for Foreseeable Future
article_text:
MOSCOW—The Bank of Russia will maintain a tight monetary policy well into the foreseeable future, it said Friday, as it tries to restore stability in the financial sector, which has been battered by the crisis in Ukraine and concerns about possible sanctions against Moscow.

The central bank left all interest rates unchanged Friday after an unexpected and sharp increase last week aimed at limiting inflationary risks that stemmed from the ruble's weakening to all-time lows. Last week, the central bank said the rate hike was...
